parameters.name: NCount
parameters.description: Number of faces modified by a feature

title: IFeature.IGetAffectedFaces
description: Gets the faces modified by a feature, such as a draft feature.

parameters.name: NCount
parameters.description: Number of faces modified by a feature

returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to array of faces VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
To determine size the of the array, call
IFeature::GetAffectedFaceCount
before calling this method.
